thread.title: DVD review: The Rock's quake blockbuster San Andreas delivers thrills and spills
thread.title_full: DVD review: The Rock's quake blockbuster San Andreas delivers thrills and spills

author: Ron Cerabona
title: DVD review: The Rock's quake blockbuster San Andreas delivers thrills and spills
text:
San Andreas . 
San Andreas (M) 
★★★ (Blu-ray)
If you have a fondness for big, slightly cheesy disaster movies, this one certainly delivers the goods, with excellent special effects and thrilling action sequences.
It was mostly filmed in Australia. However, the film is set in California where the San Andreas Fault is a constant threat. 
Helicopter rescue pilot Ray (Dwayne Johnson) is brooding over his impending divorce from Emma (Carla Gugino​), who has formed a new relationship with rich architect Daniel (Ioan Gruffudd​) when a massive earthquake hits Los Angeles. Ray's thoughts immediately swing to his family, especially his daughter, Blake (Alexandra Daddario​), as chaos overtakes the city.
Advertisement The film has a good cast including Paul Giamatti​ as a seismologist – who features in a scary scene depicting the destruction of the Hoover Dam – and, presumably in a nod to its filming location, even Kylie Minogue pops up in a cameo.
Johnson may not be the world's greatest actor but he's an amiable presence who knows his limitations and works well within them and he and the other actors keep you interested in the story and the characters. 
There are plenty of extras on the Blu-ray including a director's commentary, deleted scenes with optional commentary and featurettes.
Ron Cerabona
